articles.title: American Academy Of Pediatrics Wants To See COVID-19 Vaccine Approved For Children - WRKF
articles.description: NPR's Ailsa Chang speaks with American Academy of Pediatrics President Lee Savio Beers about the mounting pressure to consider emergency use authorization of COVID-19 vaccines for children under 12.
